channel.title: Yeh about pimpscape
channel.description: when i start up my server with runserver.bat then i try and get onto it, it says error connecting and stuff.i use to have Project16 and i would just put localhost as the ip but with pimpscape do i need to acctually get a ip before i can log on or do i use the thing thats says '0.0.0.0:5000' as the ip?

item.title: Yeh about pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @Mattie_Boy Mattie Boy
item.description:
@Mattie_Boy wrote:

Also the ip needs to be used with hamachi. u create a network then run the pimpscape server, it will say Starting Pimpscape Server ’ 0.0.0.0:5555 ’

Make sure the Moparscape port is on 5555 ( if not File -> New Port )
When you do that type in your hamachi IP ( File -> New IP -> Type The Hamachi One )
Hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Yeh about pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:
@xxchainxx wrote:

the port number is 5555 pimpscape and u can also change it to what u want by going into
server.java hit ctrl+f and search for 5555 and replace that with whatever u want
hope i could help both of u

P.S: to changed the port number on mopar its in the top-left hand corner

Read full topic
